entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump But, he will allow ...

* Russia to pay bounties to Taliban fighters to kill American troops
* Allow COVID-19 to kill 125,000 Americans 
* Protesters to be tear gassed and shot with baton rounds
* China, North Korea, Russia and Saudi Arabia to play him like a fiddle
* Lie
